name: Farmyard Stickers - FREE Sticker Book for Boys & Girls
name_original: Farmyard Stickers - FREE Sticker Book for Boys & Girls
description:
★☆ Boys and Girls love Farmyard animals - with this FREE sticker book they can let their imagination run wild! ☆★

- Over 150 animals, crops, planes, people, trees, birds, objects and buildings to choose from

- Move things around the scene as much as you like
- Resize objects to give a sense of depth
- Rotate stuff
- Flip things - doubles the amount of objects available!!

- Step-by-step interactive tutorial mode
- Save pictures to the Camera Roll, then send them on to Friends!

Scenes can be saved for later and reloaded at any time. Fine placement of objects is easy, with the pinch-to-zoom ability.

*** This is the ad-supported free version - additional items can be unlocked from the store. Play daily and receive FREE coins! You can also get FREE coins by completing actions from our partners, like viewing videos ***
